p.n: BSL Zone: Punk Chef on the Road
p.k: Punk Chef Scott Garthwaite travels to Gloucestershire to find top-quality produce. Scott finds inspiration at a service station and meets a pioneering deaf cook
Thriller with Joan Tetzel and Alan Ladd. When her father is killed, a whaling-boat skipper teams up with a crewman to track the murderer. Whaling footage
Kenneth More stars in director Roy Ward Baker's acclaimed drama about the fateful final night of the RMS Titanic's maiden voyage. With Honor Blackman and Ronald Allen
Western starring John Wayne and Geraldine Page. A US cavalryman takes a rancher who's been abandoned by her husband under his wing, protecting her from Apache aggression
Ursula Jeans stars in a home front drama that examines the pressures that women were under during World War II and also in the years of austerity that followed
Action thriller starring Pierce Brosnan and Linda Hamilton. A scientist's warning that a volcano is set to erupt is unwisely ignored by the inhabitants
James Spader and Kurt Russell go through a Stargate to a distant planet where the evil god Ra (Jaye Davidson), who created humanity, is planning his return
Tony Servillo stars in Paolo Sorrentino's Oscar-winning comedy-drama about a 65-year-old society journalist looking back on his life with a critical eye
Drama about two very different 13-year-old boys who become close friends - only for a dispute between their parents to threaten their relationship
